results.title: What Is Neon Serverless Postgres? - Azure Native Integrations
results.description: Neon Serverless Postgres is a cloud-native, serverless, fully managed PostgreSQL database service jointly developed and managed by Microsoft and Neon as an Azure Native Integration. Use Azure Native I... Neon Serverless Postgres is designed for applications that require rapid scaling, cost optimization, and advanced development workflows. Learn.

results.title: Neon Serverless Postgres Preview Developer Resources and Tools - Azure Native Integrations
results.description: Resources and tools for Neon Serverless Postgres Preview on Azure In this article, you learn about resources and tools from Neon that can help you use Neon Serverless Postgres Preview. Developer experience with Neon Neon features Neon pricing To get started with Neon: Learn the basics Connect Neon to your stack Learn about database branching Get.
